title: Riot, the hell is with these sudden lag spikes?
body: Ever since this morning I have been getting delays in everything I do in game. I click 6 times to move, it doesn't register until 10 seconds later. And no, I checked my internet, it's fine.

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine you can have problems reaching specific servers, like the game server.  These lagspikes suggest an issue like packet loss, so run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview.  let me know what you find.

Also, every time I even begin a game I get this. http://i.imgur.com/DoL2GO7.png

My network is fine, no issues in my area. Just do some checks on your servers, because something's up. I also tried logging in to get the server is busy try again later prompt, which also further points the finger away from my connection.

As suspected, your network seems to be having issues or a block connecting to the game server.  Regardless of how fine your internet might be, you can still have problems reaching specific servers.  I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Go through each step to rule out possibilities and test it in a custom game to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I did a ping test. This is the log result.

PING www.google.com (216.58.198.164): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 216.58.198.164: icmp_seq=0 ttl=54 time=13.987 ms
64 bytes from 216.58.198.164: icmp_seq=1 ttl=54 time=15.157 ms
64 bytes from 216.58.198.164: icmp_seq=2 ttl=54 time=15.599 ms
64 bytes from 216.58.198.164: icmp_seq=3 ttl=54 time=17.939 ms

--- www.google.com ping statistics ---
4 packets transmitted, 4 packets received, 0.0% packet loss
round-trip min/avg/max/stddev = 13.987/15.670/17.939/1.436 ms
I tried and did every solution I can. No change. And considering the other posts that pretty much sum up my issue, this is on your server's end.
